stories.title: Adult Coloring Book Review
stories.author: Anna Lawley
stories.body: Adult coloring books are the best!

stories.title: Roman Candle Cookies in Hot Demand
stories.author: Mary Warrington
stories.body: Due to crazy cookie lady eating all Roman Candle chocolate chip cookies, the city of Portland is experiencing a shortage of baked goods! Customers have reported being stalked on their way to purchase cookies.

stories.title: How to Make the Best Bitmoji
stories.author: Michelle Brecunier
stories.body: Look at my Bitmoji. Isn't it great? I bet you wish you had a bitmoji like mine.
